titleStmt.title: The Scotch lasses constancy or Jenny's lamentation for the death of Jockey: who for her sake was unfortunately kill'd by Sawney in a duel. Being a most pleasant new song, to a new tune.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.)
Attributed to Thomas D'Urfey. cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
